title: Reducing the Sign Problem with simple Contour Deformation
authors:
Christoph G\"antgen, Evan Berkowitz, Thomas Luu, Johann Ostmeyer and
  Marcel Rodekamp
abstract:
We apply constant imaginary offsets to the path integral for a reduction of
the sign problem in the Hubbard model. These simple transformations enhance the
quality of results from HMC calculations without compromising the speed of the
algorithm. This method enables us to efficiently calculate systems that are
otherwise inaccessible due to a severe sign problem. To support this claim, we
present observables of the C20 and C60 fullerenes. Furthermore, we demonstrate
that at a certain offset, the sign problem is completely lifted in the limit of
large chemical potential.
